data.title: How much do you know about Groupe RATP and the Parisian public transport system?
data.meta_description: Are you curious about one of the largest urban transportation operators in the world? Take this quiz to test your knowledge on the RATP Group, a public transportation company operating in 13 countries. From its mission and personality traits to its governance and recent contracts, this quiz covers various aspects of the RATP Group's operations and values. Test your understanding of this important transportation company and learn new facts along the way.
data.text:
Questions and Answers Quel est le nombre d'employés de la RATP ? 100 000 200 000 63 000 (correct) 23 000 Quel est le statut de la RATP ? Une entreprise mixte Une entreprise coopérative Une entreprise publique (correct) Une entreprise privée Quel est le chiffre d'affaires de la RATP en 2020 ? 7,2 milliards d'euros 3,7 milliards d'euros 1,5 milliard d'euros 5,5 milliards d'euros (correct) Quel est le nombre de lignes de tramway exploitées par la RATP ?

7

Signup and view all the answers Qui est responsable de la coordination des transports en commun dans la région Île-de-France ?

Île-de-France Mobilités

Signup and view all the answers Quel est le montant de l'investissement de la RATP dans la région Île-de-France en 2020 ?

2,2 milliards d'euros

Signup and view all the answers Qui est la présidente-directrice générale de la RATP ?

Catherine Guillouard

Signup and view all the answers Quels sont les principes sur lesquels repose la mission de la RATP ?

Égalité, adaptabilité et continuité

Signup and view all the answers Qu'est-ce que le contrat IdFM/RATP pour 2021-2024 prévoit ?

Des objectifs ambitieux pour améliorer la qualité de service

Signup and view all the answers Quel est le système introduit dans le contrat IdFM/RATP pour encourager la qualité de service ?

Un système de bonus/malus

Signup and view all the answers Study Notes Groupe RATP is a transportation company operating in 13 countries on four continents. It is the 3rd largest urban transportation operator in the world. The company has 63,000 employees and operates 16 metro lines, 2 RER lines, 7 tramway lines, and 338 bus lines. Its mission is based on the principles of equality, adaptability, and continuity. The company is an EPIC, a public entity with an industrial and commercial status. It guarantees transportation rights for 15 to 30 years. The company had a turnover of 5.5 billion euros in 2020. It invested 2.2 billion euros in the Ile-de-France region in 2020. The company has four main activities: guaranteeing service quality, creating and operating networks, designing and maintaining infrastructure, and implementing sustainable mobility. The company's personality traits include a focus on people, a culture of service, and a commitment to performance. The RATP Group is a public transport company in Paris, France. The company values ethics, compliance, social responsibility, and inclusivity. A code of ethics is in place for all employees. The company is led by a President and CEO, Catherine Guillouard. The RATP Group is governed by a 27-member Board of Directors. Ile de France Mobilités (IdFM) is the authority responsible for coordinating public transport in the region. IdFM is responsible for defining transport conditions, creating tickets, and coordinating modernization. The new IdFM/RATP contract for 2021-2024 includes a record investment of 8.4 billion euros and ambitious goals for improving service quality. The contract introduces a bonus/malus system for service quality and a new mechanism for compensating RER A and B passengers in case of unacceptable punctuality. The contract prepares for the opening of the transport network to competition. Studying That Suits You Use AI to generate personalized quizzes and flashcards to suit your learning preferences. Description Are you curious about one of the largest urban transportation operators in the world? Take this quiz to test your knowledge on the RATP Group, a public transportation company operating in 13 countries. From its mission and personality traits to its governance and recent contracts, this quiz covers various aspects of the RATP Group's operations and values. Test your understanding of this important transportation company and learn new facts along the way.
